sentence: Florida Republican Governor Ron DeSantis signed into law the Stop the Wrongs to Our Kids and Employees Act or Stop WOKE Act a bill that regulates how schools and employers can talk about race and genderon April 22. We believe an important component of freedom in the state of Florida is the freedom from having oppressive ideologies imposed upon you without your consent,? DeSantis said at the bill signing event at Mater Academy Charter Middle/High School in Hialeah Gardens last month.
author: Amiah Taylor
title: How Floridas Stop WOKE Act could impose a chilling effect on diversity efforts in the workplace
